description: This file provides authentication-related functions including password hashing, verification, JWT token creation, and decoding, using external libraries such as jose and passlib. It interacts with application settings for secret keys and token expiration.

methods.name: str hash_password(plain_password: str)
methods.description: Hashes a plaintext password using bcrypt.

methods.name: bool verify_password(plain_password: str, hashed_password: str)
methods.description: Verifies a plaintext password against a bcrypt hash.

methods.name: str create_access_token( subject: str, tenant_id: str, additional_claims: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, expires_in: Optional[int] = None, )
methods.description: Creates a signed JWT token with subject, tenant ID, optional claims, and optional expiration.

methods.name: Tuple[bool,Optional[Dict[str,Any]],Optional[str]] decode_token(token: str)
methods.description: Decodes and validates a JWT token, returning success status, claims, and error message if any.

ctags.name: create_access_token
ctags.signature: ( subject: str, tenant_id: str, additional_claims: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, expires_in: Optional[int] = None, )

ctags.name: decode_token
ctags.pattern: /^def decode_token(token: str) -> Tuple[bool, Optional[Dict[str, Any]], Optional[str]]:$/
